lines.text:
[to the Blacklist Committee]
Fuck them!
Uh, I'm seeing Dorothy tonight. Paulie's gonna stay at his friends. I thought I'd take her to one of those places out by Malibu.
Malibu, can you afford that?
Can you believe you said that?
No, I'd never say anything like that.
Wanna go?
Sure, do you mind?
Yeah.
[she leaves]
Don't make me crawl through the mud... they're my friends.
I'm afraid to talk to my friends, my husband is crazy, we're all dead!
...I inform on these people, they lose their jobs, they lose their... everything.

[to Joe Lesser]
You just can't let them do this to you, you can't let them get away with this.
Upset? Why should I be upset? You've only ruined my life. Why should I be upset?

You asked me how I'm doing. You wanna know how I'm doing? I can't get a job... can't get a job. All my friends - gone. I'm being followed by the FBI everywhere I go. I lost my house. I can't even buy my son a bike for Christmas.
I'm a filmmaker. That's all I am, I don't know what else to do. What the hell do they think I'm gonna do? Blow all the bridges if the Red Army comes invading Manhattan?

[about Dorothy Nolan]
She was a good wife, a good mother, and you're responsible for her death. She was falsely accused, she couldn't get work, her son was taken away from her - all because of this committee. In the name of ridding the world of Communism, you destroyed her life.

I might not be the best citizen in this country, but I was raised to stand up for what I believe in, and I'm going to raise my son in the same way, and as hard as that is sometimes, I'm gonna try to live it, and if that isn't what a real American is, then we've failed!
I wanna know how many Communists you knew. I wanna know how many you know, how many you've worked with. I wanna know what your association is with them.
Make a good film, David!
They want the names, David, that's why we're here. C'mon, you can't beat these bastards. You keep this up and they'll tear up your head off.
They've already done that.

[after a brief moment]
Fuck them!
I beg to be excused, Mr. Chairman. My client has just dismissed me!
[walks off]
